pr_title: feat(ProjectUI):Add Clearing Request button in project Details page

timeline.message:
feat(ProjectUI):Add Clearing Request button in project Details page

Signed-off-by: Abdul Kapti <abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com>

timeline.bodyText: Instead of using jstl:if to hide a button. It can be used to add appropriate button . It will prevent presence of unused button hidded in UI
timeline.author: JaideepPalit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -122,6 +122,15 @@ +
+ +

replies.bodyText:
This is needed, because once clearing request is created, the Create Clearing Request button should be hidden and View Clearing Request button should be displayed.
I tried making it work using single button by changing the button id and content html after CR creation, But it isn't working as expected.
replies.author: akapti

timeline.author: JaideepPalit
